body_html: I kind of worked around this by setting num_workers=0 until now since I was only having the issue during test time, but now I started seeing this during validation, which is pretty bad. I will try to reproduce it and will let you know if I manage to do it.

body: I kind of worked around this by setting `num_workers=0` until now since I was only having the issue during test time, but now I started seeing this during validation, which is pretty bad. I will try to reproduce it and will let you know if I manage to do it.
